_sName: Mouse controlled searchlight for your ZE/JB needs
_sText:
After some messing around I managed to create a mouse controlled searchlight that you can turn on/off with a button and control with your mouse. It was tedious but i did it... 

You can attach the base of the light to any object... even a train, because it uses a parent system....
Just imagine.... in a ze map you have a dark map with a train that has a searchlight :D

Hope it's useful. If it has any bugs.... please let me know.
